p.span: The mission of Primero School District is to build collaborative partnerships, in a safe and secure environment, among educators, students, parents and our community so our students acquire the knowledge and skills they need to thrive and contribute in a world where change is constant and learning never stops. We believe in the success of all learners!

THANK YOU!
For your investment in our kids and our community!
Building partnership between school and community.

div.class: vc_row wpb_row section vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1570056131865 grid_section

div.p: Primero School District Community Center is now available for public use. Please see the building usage agreement and submit it with your request for use of the Community Center
If you are having trouble getting through to PRIMERO SCHOOL on the phone. Please call or text 719-859-5060 BETWEEN THE HOURS OF 8 A.M. and 4:30 P.M. Thank you!

div.style: font-family: Roboto Slab; font-size: 60px; line-height: 70px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; color: #ffffff; text-decoration: none; text-align: center;

div.div: SAFETY AND SECURITY AT PRIMERO SCHOOL DISTRICT

div.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; line-height: 24px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 300; color: #ffffff; text-decoration: none; text-align: center;

p.span: PRIMERO SCHOOL DISTRICT IS DEDICATED TO THE HEALTH, WELFARE AND SAFETY OF OUR STUDENTS

Nick Mattorano is the Director of Safety and Security. With the support of the Las Animas County Sheriff department he is fortunate to fall under their colors and has full arrest powers. This allows conducting law enforcement tasks, supporting the school in the event of a school emergency, and handling the day to day operations. Being in conjunction with the Sheriffâs office is a great partnership for providing a safe environment for both the school and the community. If you have any questions or concerns please feel free to call.
Nick Mattorano, Director of Safety and Security

div.class: vc_row wpb_row section vc_row-fluid vc_inner vc_custom_1551239236190
vc_row wpb_row section vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1551313605731 grid_section

div.h5: Primero School District Out of District Application Form

div.p: Primero School District is accepting Out of District students for the fall schedule. Click on the Primero School Out of District Application Form and fill out and submit the information by fax, mail or bring it to the school office. All out of district students must resubmit an application including returning out of district students. Class sizes are limited so apply soon!
PRIMERO PUPPLYLAND PRE-SCHOOL HOURS ARE FROM 7:45 A.M. TO 4:05 P.M.
PRIMERO OFFERS FREE BREAKFAST AND LUNCH TO ALL STUDENTS!
FOR MORE INFORMATION PLEASE CALL 719-868-2715. CLASS SIZE IS LIMITED.
Out of District Students must first fill out an Out of District Application.
Busing is not provided to preschool students.

div.class: vc_row wpb_row section vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1551313033353 grid_section

div.p: Please click the link to view the 2018 School Supply LIst.
Please click the link to view the Primero School Board Wellness Policy
Please click the link to fill out new student enrollment packet. If you are an out of district student you must first submit Out of District Application above.
